name: Pizza Roller
description:
Pizza Roll is a SuperMonkey Ball inspired Demo for the Kenney Jam 2021!

Use Arrow Keys to move and collect pizzas!

Get to the exit and don't fall out of bounds!

Press ESC key at tilte screen to exit game.

Uses the following assets:

Template: 

Ultra CaveMan Sphere Prototype

https://github.com/grego-git/UltraCavemanSpheresPrototype

Musics: 

Cheerful Annoyance

Game Over

Swinging Pants

Sfx: 

Pickup 1

Font: 

Kenny Bold

2d Tile:

Grass Center

3D Models:

Overhead Round Colored

Character Small / Alien A

Pizza

Non Kenney 3D models:

Skysphere Volume 1 / Hedgehog Team

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/skysphere-volume...

Skybox:

Background Elements -redux
